messages.title: Local Choice Local Champion
messages.content: Local residents are sick and tired of politicians from outside of our area who seem to only want to line their own pockets. At the same time they run down our local services, and are only seen here when they think they can get their pictures in the papers. It is time that Old Bexley and Sidcup had a local voice who will put local people first. Best wishes, Duncan Borrowman

keyPolicies.policyDescription: While Labour have run down services at our hospital, and Conservatives have done even worse only playing the blame game. It is time for a change for the hospital.
Britain has suffered the worst 'Gordon Brown' in industrialised world recession; we're broke. Local people have lost their jobs and are finding it hard to make ends meet.

mentions.candidate: Duncan Borrowman believes Queen Mary's has been the hospital for the area. The behaviour of the Bethlem Royal under our health services has been shameful.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: While Labour have run down services at our hospital, and Conservatives have done even worse
mentions.partyLeader: Lib Dem campaigner Duncan Borrowman A vote for Duncan Borrowman is a vote for Nick Clegg

politicalExperience.role: 12 years Campaign Manager working with Paddy Ashdown and Charles Kennedy

quotes.text: Duncan Borrowman the champion against sleaze and corruption
